  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Project Manager",
  "description": "Hayok Medicare Limited has significant experience in project management, organisational development, proposal development and resource mobilization in the health and other social sectors. With our Listen Design Implement Reflect Adapt (LiDIRA) approach, we deliver high quality results for your organisation.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Project Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Abuja
Employment Type: Full-time

Minimum Experience / Key Skills


	Minimum of 7 years of experience managing large-scale fintech, digital health, marketplace, or enterprise technology projects.
	Strong understanding of the Nigerian regulatory environment, public-private partnerships, and multi-stakeholder project delivery.
	Excellent skills in project planning, risk management, reporting, and stakeholder coordination.
	Demonstrated ability to deliver complex solutions within time, scope, and budget.


Required Certification (Minimum):


	PMP or PRINCE2 certification.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should submit their Curriculum Vitae (CV) and Relevant professional certifications to:&nbsp;hr@hayokmedicare.ng&nbsp;using the Job Position applied for as the subject of the email.

Note


	Hayok Medicare Limited encourages female applicants to apply.
	Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

Project Manager Job at Hayok Medicare Limited




        
    

        
        Hayok Medicare Limited has significant experience in project management, organisational development, proposal development and resource mobilization in the health and other social sectors. With our Listen Design Implement Reflect Adapt (LiDIRA) approach, we deliver high quality results for your organisation.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Project Manager

Job Location: Abuja
Employment Type: Full-time

Minimum Experience / Key Skills
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Minimum of 7 years of experience managing large-scale fintech, digital health, marketplace, or enterprise technology projects.
	Strong understanding of the Nigerian regulatory environment, public-private partnerships, and multi-stakeholder project delivery.
	Excellent skills in project planning, risk management, reporting, and stakeholder coordination.
	Demonstrated ability to deliver complex solutions within time, scope, and budget.


Required Certification (Minimum):


	PMP or PRINCE2 certification.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should submit their Curriculum Vitae (CV) and Relevant professional certifications to: hr@hayokmedicare.ng using the Job Position applied for as the subject of the email.

Note


	Hayok Medicare Limited encourages female applicants to apply.
	Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.
    

    

        Click here to Apply
